feed.title: Category: JSONP | Yet Another Kinopyo Blog

entry.title: メモ：PHPでJSONPを返すサンプルコード
entry.content:
PHP側で

```php echo $_GET'callback' . '(' . json_encode($object) . ');';

```

JS側で

```javascript

$(function(){
     $.getJSON('foo.php?callback=?',
                {},  // No additional parameters sent
                function (data) {
                     // data is now JSON object instantiated from retrieved info
                     alert(data*'key'*);
     });
});

```

参考： http://www.carolinamantis.com/wordpress/?p=29
